import React, { useState } from 'react' import Header from '../Header' import { Dropdown, Grid, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { MoreVert } from '@material-ui/icons' import './inspiration.css' import img from '../../img/slide2.jpg' import img1 from '../../img/ft2.jpg' // import Footer from './../footer/index.js' import Pagination from '@material-ui/lab/Pagination'; import { Button, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' const Inspiration = () => { const [proptypevalue, setproptypevalue] = useState(" ") const [state, dispatch] = React.useReducer(exampleReducer, { open: false, dimmer: undefined, }) const { open, dimmer } = state; function exampleReducer(state, action) { switch (action.type) { case 'OPEN_MODAL': return { open: true, dimmer: action.dimmer } case 'CLOSE_MODAL': return { open: false } default: throw new Error() } } const proptypeoptions = [ { key: 1, text: 'Bedroom', value: 1 }, { key: 2, text: 'Drawing Room', value: 2 }, { key: 3, text: 'Washroom/Toilet', value: 3 }, { key: 4, text: 'Study Room', value: 4 }, { key: 5, text: 'kitchen ', value: 5 }, { key: 6, text: 'Balcony', value: 6 }, { key: 7, text: 'Mandir', value: 7 }, { key: 8, text: 'Home office', value: 8 }, { key: 9, text: 'Home Theater', value: 9 }, { key: 10, text: 'Home Bar', value: 10 }, ] const overlayoptions = [ { key: 1, text: 'Bedroom', value: 1 }, { key: 2, text: 'Drawing Room', value: 2 }, { key: 3, text: 'Washroom/Toilet', value: 3 }, { key: 4, text: 'Study Room', value: 4 }, { key: 5, text: 'kitchen ', value: 5 }, { key: 6, text: 'Balcony', value: 6 }, ] const handleChangeprop = (event) => { setproptypevalue(event.target.value) }; return ( <>
